headline: Why Utilities Stocks Are Your Best Friend in 2026
summary: For as long as most people can remember, utility stocks have been the investing equivalent of eating your vegetables. Are they good for you? Yes. Are they boring stocks? Also yes. These stocks feel like the kind of thing you would find in your parents’ investment portfolio, but not your own. The good news is ... Why Utilities Stocks Are Your Best Friend in 2026

headline: A Look At Vistra (VST) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Vistra’s recent share performance in focus Vistra (VST) has come into focus after a weak stretch for the stock, with negative returns over the past week, month and past 3 months, prompting investors to reassess how its fundamentals line up with today’s price. See our latest analysis for Vistra. That recent 1 day share price decline of 8.81% and 26.38% share price pullback over 90 days come after a very large 5 year total shareholder return of about 7x, so momentum looks to be fading in the...
